**O M G! Bollywood Breakdown: Who's Dating Who?!**

unnormalised: Hey guys! Spill the chai, because the Bollywood gossip is piping HOT this week. You won't BELIEVE what's been happening behind the scenes!
normalised: Hey guys! Spill the chai, because the Bollywood gossip is piping HOT this week. You won't BELIEVE what's been happening behind the scenes!

unnormalised: First up, whispers are flying around about Isha Sharma and Rohan Kapoor. Remember Rohan? The cute guy from "Dil Dosti Etc."? Apparently, they were spotted having dinner at Bastian in Bandra, and a VERY reliable source (my cousin’s neighbour's driver!) says they were holding hands! Is this the next big power couple, or just a friendly catch-up? Only time will tell, but my Insta feed is already blowing up with #Ishan!

Apparently, they were spotted having dinner at Bastian in Bandra, and a VERY reliable source (my cousin’s neighbour's driver!) says they were holding hands! Is this the next big power couple, or just a friendly catch-up? Only time will tell, but my Insta feed is already blowing up with hash Ishan!

unnormalised: Then there's the whole drama surrounding Arjun Desai. Remember he was supposed to be getting hitched to Priya Malhotra in December? Well, sources say the wedding is OFF! Apparently, Mummyji wasn't too keen on Priya's… ahem… “modern” lifestyle. You know how it is! All that pressure from the family, especially if they are from a place like say, IIT Bombay. My heart goes out to Priya, honestly. Girl, you dodged a bullet!

unnormalised: And finally, the biggest shocker of all: rumors suggest that Deepika Padukone might be expecting! Spotted in a loose-fitting kurta at the airport, fans are going WILD with speculation. Is the stork visiting the Ranveer Singh household soon? Only time will tell, but the entire nation is holding its breath! This gossip is spicier than Mom's chilli paneer! I need to lie down.
